title: Former Heavyweight Boxer Charged With Trafficking $1 Billion of Cocaine
description: Goran Gogic helped move vast amounts of cocaine from Colombia to Europe using U.S. ports, prosecutors said. One haul was among the largest cocaine seizures in U.S. history, they said.
dc:creator: Christine Chung
media:description: Goran Gogic, a former heavyweight boxer, was charged with trafficking over 20 tons of cocaine estimated to be worth more than $1 billion, prosecutors said.
